REST API repository Contacts¶

async src.repository.contacts.create_contact(body: ContactSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Creates a new contact for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • body – The data for the contact to create.

  • user – The user to create the contact for.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function.

Returns:

The newly created contact.

async src.repository.contacts.delete_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Removes a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – The ID of the contact to remove.

  • user – The user to remove the contact for.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function.

Returns:

The removed contact.

async src.repository.contacts.get_all_contacts(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession)¶

The get_all_contacts function returns a list of all contacts in the database.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: Limit the number of contacts returned.

  • offset – int: Specify how many rows to skip.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database connection to the function.

Returns:

A list of contacts objects.

async src.repository.contacts.get_contact(contact_id: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

The get_contact function takes in an id, and returns the contact object with that id.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – int: Specify the id of the contact to get.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function.

  • user – User: Get the user who created the contact.

Returns:

A contact object.

async src.repository.contacts.get_contacts(limit: int, offset: int, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

The get_contacts function returns a list of contacts for the user.

Parameters:

  • limit – int: Limit the number of contacts returned.

  • offset – int: Skip the first n results.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass a database connection to the function.

  • user – User: Filter the contacts by user.

Returns:

A list of contacts objects.

async src.repository.contacts.get_upcoming_birthdays(db: AsyncSession)¶

Retrieves a list of contacts with upcoming birthdays within the next 7 days, adjusting the birthday celebration date if it falls on a weekend.

Parameters:

db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries with contact names and their adjusted birthday celebration dates within the next 7 days.

async src.repository.contacts.search_contacts(query: str, db: AsyncSession)¶

Searches for contacts in the database that match a given query string in their first name, last name, or email.

Parameters:

  • query – The search string to look for in the contacts’ first name, last name, or email.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function.

Returns:

A list of contacts that match the search query.

async src.repository.contacts.update_contact(contact_id: int, body: ContactUpdateSchema, db: AsyncSession, user: User)¶

Updates a single contact with the specified ID for a specific user.

Parameters:

  • contact_id – The ID of the contact to update.

  • body – The updated data for the contact.

  • user – The user to update the contact for.

  • db – AsyncSession: Pass the database session to the function.

Returns:

The updated contact.
